CustomField.description: Type C: Related to the purchase of output from Taxonomy-aligned economic activities and individual measures enabling the target activities to become low-carbon or to lead to greenhouse gas reductions, provided that such measures are implemented and operational within 18 months (where turnover is not eligible nor aligned).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Type C: Related to the purchase of output from Taxonomy-aligned economic activities and individual measures enabling the target activities to become low-carbon or to lead to greenhouse gas reductions, provided that such measures are implemented and operational within 18 months (where turnover is not eligible nor aligned).
CustomField.label: Capex C
